Description: With its comfortable body and distinctive voice, the M-120E provides excellent balance and a delicate tone. Featuring solid African mahogany top, back and sides, the M-120E 24 ¾ scale length, vintage shaped Guild neck, and 1¾ nut width make this concert size guitar easy to play. Additional features include an Indian rosewood fingerboard and bridge, NuBone nut and saddle, and period-correct tortoiseshell pickguard. Title: Guild M-120E Concert Size Acoustic-Electric Steel String Mahogany Guitar w/Case
SecondaryCategoryName: Musical Instruments & Gear:Guitars & Basses:Acoustic Electric Guitars
ConditionDescription: This guitar is set up and ready to play, everything works. It came to us directly from Guild, and is in un-played condition with only surface marks from handling.  It is marked "B" on its label for cosmetic reasons. We could not find the blemish. The action is set at 3/32" at the 12th fret, the electronics work great and the truss rod is active. We are selling it as manufacturer refurbished with a 90 day factory warranty and Guild PolyFoam Case.
